LanguageData.AEXP_EggRattlesnakeUnfertilized.label: rattlesnake egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.AEXP_EggRattlesnakeUnfertilized.descript: An unfertilized rattlesnake egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.AEXP_EggRattlesnakeFertilized.label: rattlesnake egg (fert.)
LanguageData.AEXP_EggRattlesnakeFertilized.descriptio: A fertilized rattlesnake egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a rattlesnake. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.WoolCamel.label: camel wool
LanguageData.WoolCamel.description: Camel's wool. It provides good insulation from heat.
